name: Save Gaia
description:
Save Gaia is a tap game where you need to protect your planet from the invaders that are trying to destroy it's nature resources.

It was developed as a entry for Ludum Dare 38 with the theme "Small World".

Controls:

  • WASD - For rotating the planet
  • Click like hell!!!

Thanks for playing.

Team:

Raphael Rosa - Programmer
Samuel Camargo - Programmer
Felipe Marques - Environment Artist
Bruna Pieri - Environment Artist
Charles Lacerda - Character Artist
Iroko Cavalcanti - UI Artist
